content: turtle sjef do you like turtles just as much as annemarie from cutedutch does turtle sjef is a super cute toy who loves to go on adventures with you with his lovely colours it is a remarkable creature in the ocean you only have to crochet him yourself yarn durable cosy fine 58% cotton & 42% polyacrylics 50g/105m colour a 2158 light green 1 ball colour b 2223 liver 1 ball durable cosy fine faded 58% cotton & 42% polyacrylics 50g/ 105m colour c 2190 coral 1 ball colour d 326 ivory 1 ball colour e 309 light yellow 1 ball durable coral mini 100% katoen 2
